channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Pathologist | The Graverobber
channel.description:
# [color=lighblue]The Pathologist (Blue Dragon Investigative)[/color]
**Night Ability: Autopsy** - Inspect the body of a dead player. You will be told who they interacted with before they died. The interactions include visits to and from the player. You can't check a dead player twice - 3 uses.
**Night Ability: Analysis** - Check a dead players body to find our their last night action and receive their result. You can't check a dead player twice - Infinite uses
**Day Ability: Obituary** - Be told privately how somebody died. - 1 use
# [color=purple]The Graverobber (Unseen Support)[/color]
**Night Ability: Dressup** - Go with the Assassin tonight and change the Class of the target when they die. They will show up as something of your choosing. - 2 uses
**Night Ability: Corpse Puppet** - You will revive your target but they will be a corpse at the table for just this day. Unable to do anything. - 1 use
**Day Ability: Corpse Party** - Control your Corpse Puppet to vote somebody. - Special
---
***Edit 1: Autopsy edited to fit with Hunter and Warrant edited because people wanted detail.***
***Edit 2: If somebody dies N2, they will be checkable on N4***
***Edit 3: Analysis is a backup***

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Pathologist | The Graverobber
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
What if Autopsy was “Can only be used when there are more than 2 dead players”

Just a thought for food

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Pathologist | The Graverobber
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
It probably can be tested now, but be aware: The ability might be still very strong for someone who died Night 1. At least if those kept a proper will.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Pathologist | The Graverobber
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
Unknown:

Maybe ditch Warrant? It does not fit the main theme, and this class does not really need it to be powerful.

Autopsy was the main focus I had for this, I had a few other ideas written up but the one right now really seemed to shine. I always discuss my stuff with Ruby or Tryphon too so, unless they didn’t like it, I wouldn’t post it.
I also had a backup for Warrant, it was an ability I moved from another idea I had for a Class.

Obituary, honestly, seemed to be more of a “is Physician converted? Better check” kinda thing, that’s one of the reasons I had it. Tryphon especially liked that and clicked onto to it’s purpose before I ever said anything.

Don’t worry about visited/visitors, it shows “Interacted with”

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Pathologist | The Graverobber
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
well you need to word that better.

You said “you are told who they visited and were visited by since day 1”

sounds like a log of info observer would get.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Pathologist | The Graverobber
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
Dunno your latest change isnt really that helpful. There is no reason to delay Autopsy further anyway.
And Obituary doesnt make it better- you can rule out princekilled people that way if there is more than one kill. At least the visited and the visitors should not be distinguishable.
Warrant and Obituary are already powerful abilities that honestly do not match with a powerful ability like that.
Maybe ditch Warrant? It does not fit the main theme, and this class does not really need it to be powerful.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Pathologist | The Graverobber
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
…okay you clearly didn’t read.

Usable any time someone dies.

To

Must wait 1 night to check a body.

–Also, it’s not following. It’s interaction.

Example of notification:

“Target A had interactions with: Target 1, Target 2, Target 3”

So on so forth.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Pathologist | The Graverobber
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
you just made autopsy more powerful. it’s like an observers follow except you know for all nights (they must be dead though)

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Pathologist | The Graverobber
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
I think I nailed it. I’m keeping the ability but gonna restrict it some more. What do?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Pathologist | The Graverobber
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
ThePlex:

Night Ability: Autopsy - Search a dead players body to find out every player who interacted with them since Day 1. Tells you who they visited and who visited them. - infinite uses.

Someone dies Night 1
Autopsy Night 2
2 people show up as visiting.A and B
A shows up as the Butler next day, dead.
B gets lynched.
Autopsy on a converted- MM included.
TLDR:Too Much Info, Overpowered.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Pathologist | The Graverobber
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
And I say once again. Never has it been that way. I know for a fact. FACT. Not “might”

FACT.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Pathologist | The Graverobber
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
Insanity:

When you go Autopsy someone who died yesterday…

I went with a little less OP approach which was kinda an idea I had in mind originally but thought it was far too complicated. After some more thinking, I went with my first idea.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Pathologist | The Graverobber
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

Night Ability: Autopsy - Search a dead players body to find out every player who visited them since Night 1. - infinite uses.

a list of all players, not showing what day, I presume?

(search guy who died night 1)
(visited by 1 guy)
(goodbye to that 1 guy)

ThePlex:

Night Ability: Warrant - Search your targets room to find out what their action is tonight. - 2 uses

like investigate, murder, occupy, etc. or the name of the ability?

ThePlex:

Day Ability: Obituary - Be told privately how somebody died. - 2 uses

This one is fine.

ThePlex:

Night Ability: Dressup - Go with the Assassin tonight and change the Class of the target when they die. They will show up as something of your choosing. - 2 uses

all abilities so far are either “select ability (like will o wisp) and it odes it’s thing” or “select numbers upon selecting it” (accept troll box). How would they select what they show up as? By the way, whatever you suggest, I also suggest it for the herbalist’s unearth ability.

ThePlex:

Night Ability: Corpse Puppet - You will revive your target but they will be a corpse at the table for just this day. Unable to do anything. - 1 use

2 uses because they only have 2 uses of dress up.

ThePlex:

Day Ability: Corpse Party - Control your Corpse Puppet to vote somebody. - Special

why is it called corpse party?

Read full topic

ThePlex:

Night Ability: Autopsy - Search a dead players body to find out every player who visited them since Night 1. - infinite uses.

I guess it is too op…

When you go Autopsy someone who died yesterday…

Doesn’t it just revealed the killer to you?

Read full topic

The Pathologist (Blue Dragon Investigative)

Night Ability: Autopsy - Inspect the body of a dead player. You will be told who they interacted with before they died. The interactions include visits to and from the player. You can’t check a dead player twice - 3 uses.
